Uses of Class
framework.engine.Scene

  • Packages that use Scene 
    Package Description
    code
    Package to contain coursework an demo code, specifically MyScene and the objects package.
    code.objects
    Add your objects to this package.
    framework.engine
    This package contains the main OpenGL windowing handling and abstract class for creating objects in your Scene.
    framework.utility
    Contains utility class Camera.
